==Chinese==

===Etymology===
* ''c.'' '''1330 - 1400:''' [[w:Luo Guanzhong|Luo Guanzhong]], ''[[s:Romance of the Three Kingdoms/Chapter 3#26|Romance of the Three Kingdoms/Chapter 3]] and [[s:Romance of the Three Kingdoms/Chapter 14#20|Chapter 14]]''
*: '''良禽擇木而棲'''，[[賢臣]][[擇主而事]]。
*:: '''''A good bird chooses''' (for himself) '''the tree upon which to perch''', the talented subject chooses (for himself) the lord that he shall serve.''

}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# A talented person is free to choose his own boss.
